tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telemetry_data (
    mission_id UUID,
    spacecraft_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_value DOUBLE PRECISION
);

CREATE TABLE spacecraft_info (
  spacecraft_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_id UUID,
  spacecraft_name VARCHAR,
  launch_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE telemetry_data ( 
  telemetry_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  spacecraft_id INT, 
  telemetry_time TIMESTAMP, 
  telemetry_value FLOAT, 
  FOREIGN KEY (spacecraft_id) REFERENCES spacecraft(spacecraft_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE mission_status ( 
  mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  spacecraft_id INT, 
  mission_start DATE, 
  mission_end DATE, 
  status STRING, 
  FOREIGN KEY (spacecraft_id) REFERENCES spacecraft(spacecraft_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE telemetry_data (
  telemetry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  telemetry_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE spacecraft (
  craft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  craft_name VARCHAR,
  manufacturer VARCHAR,
  launch_date DATE,
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE missions (
  mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR,
  launch_date DATE,
  mission_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE status_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  telemetry_id INT,
  report_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  report_text TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE Mission (mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, mission_name VARCHAR(255), launch_date DATE, spacecraft_id INT, mission_status VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE Spacecraft (spacecraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY, spacecraft_name VARCHAR(255), manufacturer VARCHAR(255), launch_date DATE, mission_id INT, status VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE TelemetryData (data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, spacecraft_id INT, telemetry_type VARCHAR(255), telemetry_value FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE SensorData (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, spacecraft_id INT, sensor_type VARCHAR(255), sensor_value FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE EventLog (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, spacecraft_id INT, event_type VARCHAR(255), event_description TEXT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
